text:
Hey, I have a beginner questions. I am playing around with Pluto Notebook and at some point I wanted to do some print debugging. But somehow the print function does not do anything?
```for k in 1:10
	print( k )
end```
does not print the numbers. Neither does show. Do I have to give a specific IO Stream?

elements.text: Hey, I have a beginner questions. I am playing around with Pluto Notebook and at some point I wanted to do some print debugging. But somehow the print function does not do anything?

for k in 1:10

text:
This is the best I know
```begin
	io = IOBuffer()
	for i in 1:10
		println(io, i)
	end
	String(take!(io))
end```
